full_threads.body:
HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

Begin forwarded message:


From: Paul Rosman <paul.rosman@reservit.com.au>

Subject: RE: Nicks restaurants

Date: 29 March 2018 at 4:01:20 pm AEDT

To: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Cc: Yvette Manettas <Yvette@nicksgroup.com.au>


Hi Heath,

I have spoken the Yvette (cc’d) and we wish to revert the Dimmi booking facility to the email booking as currently at the Nick’s seafood etc.

Can you confirm that this is achievable by Wednesday morning?

Apologies for the short notice but we have a tight timeframe to get off Dimmi.

Any questions call me.

Regards

Paul

From: Paul Rosman
Sent: Thursday, 29 March 2018 1:17 PM
To: 'Yvette Manettas' <Yvette@nicksgroup.com.au>
Cc: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: RE: Nicks restaurants

Hi Yvette,

We are still working on the Reservit online booking gadget’s modification. I suggest we do the online booking for all venues as per the Nicks Seafood and Nick’s Bar and Grill. I spoke to Heath and he said it would take a couple a hours to complete. We would need Tuesday to complete the change – Heath to confirm.

This would allow us to do the Import on Wednesday of all past and future Dimmi bookings into ReservIT for Adria, I’m Angus and Stacks.

We need Tuesday to also to setup MyGuestList to configure the 3 stores to do the email booking confirmations by ReservIT/MyGestList in place on Dimmi starting Wednesday morning.

This is simplest approach.

Regards

Paul

From: Paul Rosman
Sent: Friday, 23 March 2018 2:54 PM
To: 'Yvette Manettas' <Yvette@nicksgroup.com.au>
Subject: RE: Nicks restaurants

Hi Yvette,

As agreed in our telephone conversation earlier today, the simpler approach is -

On an agreed day after the Easter weekend,

  1. Go live - Import all past and future Dimmi bookings into ReservIT for Adria, I’m Angus and Stacks (ReservIT)
  2. Nicks staff to verify bookings both past and present (Nicks Staff)
  3. Nicks staff maintain and take new bookings in ReservIT only ( Nicks Staff)
  4. Disable Dimmi online third bookings party (Dimmi)
  5. Enable ReservIT Online bookings gadget on Nicks web site (WOLFIQ)
  6. Enable ResDiary as a reference booking sheet for one week after the cut over (Dimmi)

ReservIT will continue to perform testing before cutover.

ReservIT will make available documentation addressing

a) Login details for the venues staff and reservations staff

b) Authority block out online booking available times based the login.

Regards

Paul

From: Paul Rosman
Sent: Thursday, 22 March 2018 2:48 PM
To: 'Yvette Manettas' <Yvette@nicksgroup.com.au>
Subject: RE: Nicks restaurants

1) Import

With the help of ResDiary UK we are now able to import all past and future Dimmi bookings into ReservIT. This avoids the use of Excel as recommended by Dimmi. This has been our main hold up.

The stores will keep using Dimmi/ResDiary until the final export is completed.

I recommend we do a test import to check all relevant data for bookings and guest profiles exported from Dimmi .

2) Online Bookings

The ReservIT Online Booking gadget requires a modification to allow MyGuestlist to send the email confirmation. This will be available Wednesday 28thMarch.

I spoke to Heath Maguire today and he is happy with the interface details of the ReservIT gadget. I shall forward to him the specific details on to him for the each of the three restaurants,

3) MyGuestList

All changes in place and we just need the to advise MyGuestList the morning we cut over and go live.

4) TimeLine

1) Tuesday 27 March - Checkout export with 3 stores

2) Wednesday 28 March – Checkout on line bookings with test import

3) Thursday 29 March – provide these links to WOLFIQ

Nicks to decide cutover data, mindful of Easter long weekend and lack support.

Regards

Paul

From: Yvette Manettas <Yvette@nicksgroup.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, 21 March 2018 8:47 PM
To: Paul Rosman <paul.rosman@reservit.com.au>
Subject: RE: Nicks restaurants

Hi Paul can you please advise where things are at? I am waiting for your confirmation to get the team to start their manual checks – we are still accepting dimmi bookings online so for that reason they are not checking the data as it is constantly changing and there will need to be another export. Has the my guestlist confirmation issue now been resolved? Can you please advise? Kind regards, Yvette

Yvette Manettas

T: 02 8281 1175 | F: 02 9264 8448 | M: 0402 023 824 | E: ymanettas@nicks-seafood.com.au | W: www.nicks-seafood.com.au

From: Paul Rosman [mailto:paul.rosman@reservit.com.au]
Sent: Tuesday, 20 March 2018 3:53 PM
To: Alex Ilievski
Cc: Andy Marcus; Yvette Manettas; Natasha Dauner
Subject: RE: Nicks restaurants

Hi Alex,

Understand now about the mobile duplicate. All good.

Thanks

Paul

From: Alex Ilievski <alex@myguestlist.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, 20 March 2018 3:16 PM
To: Paul Rosman <paul.rosman@reservit.com.au>
Cc: Andy Marcus <andy@myguestlist.com.au>; Yvette Manettas <Yvette@nicksgroup.com.au>; Natasha Dauner <natasha@nicksgroup.com.au>
Subject: Re: Nicks restaurants

Hi Paul

We have received and sent out both reminders. They both went to the "paul.d.rosman@gmail.com" email address as the mobile duplicate check would have updated your contact record to the last email address we received.

Gmail has also confirmed receipt of the emails with the responses below.

Mar 20, 2018 12:31 pm 250 2.0.0 OK 1521509467 i123si106637ywf.77 - gsmtp

Mar 20, 2018 12:31 pm 250 2.0.0 OK 1521509467 o4si101548ywa.357 - gsmtp

Can you check if these emails landed in the Spam or Promotions folders?

Cheers

Alex Ilievski

CTO

E | alex@myguestlist.com.au M | +61 432 715 598 T | +61 (03) 9999 2585 W | www.myguestlist.com

On Tue, Mar 20, 2018 at 2:38 PM, Paul Rosman <paul.rosman@reservit.com.au> wrote:

Hi Alex

This was sent MyGuestList

2018-03-20 12:30:07.6439|Trace|{"IdReservation":112433,"FirstName":"Paul","LastName":"Rosman","Email":"paul.rosman@reservit.com.au","Mobile":"0432411844","Telephone":"","Gender":"","Street":"","Suburb":"","State":"","PostCode":"","DOB":"","Company":"","EnrolDate":"","Points":"","Outlet":"NICK\u0027S BAR & GRILL","Source":"","Occasion":"","Pax":7,"TimeRequested":"18:45","GroupName":"","GuestCategory":"","Seating":"","ResCategory":"","DateRequested":"2018/06/01","TransactionType":"Booking","IdGuest":40187}

2018-03-20 12:30:12.7372|Trace|{"IdReservation":284171,"FirstName":"Paul","LastName":"Rosman","Email":"paul.d.rosman@gmail.com","Mobile":"0432411844","Telephone":"","Gender":"","Street":"","Suburb":"","State":"","PostCode":"","DOB":"","Company":"","EnrolDate":"","Points":"","Outlet":"NICK\u0027S SEAFOOD","Source":"","Occasion":"","Pax":5,"TimeRequested":"20:30","GroupName":"","GuestCategory":"","Seating":"","ResCategory":"","DateRequested":"2018/06/01","TransactionType":"Booking","IdGuest":168552}

Regards

Paul

From: Alex Ilievski <alex@myguestlist.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, 20 March 2018 2:28 PM
To: Paul Rosman <paul.rosman@reservit.com.au>
Cc: Andy Marcus <andy@myguestlist.com.au>; Yvette Manettas <Yvette@nicksgroup.com.au>; Natasha Dauner <natasha@nicksgroup.com.au>
Subject: Re: Nicks restaurants

Hi Paul

I'll have a look at what we received. Can you confirm the email address you used to make the reservations?

Cheers

Alex Ilievski

CTO

E | alex@myguestlist.com.au M | +61 432 715 598 T | +61 (03) 9999 2585 W | www.myguestlist.com

On Tue, Mar 20, 2018 at 2:09 PM, Paul Rosman <paul.rosman@reservit.com.au> wrote:

Hi Andy and Alex

I have tested the existing ReservIT sites, Cyren, Nicks Seafood and Nicks Bar and Grill. I did not get a confirmation email from MyGuestLIst on making a booking at the venues.

Can you confirm these sites are enabled to the send the booking emails from MyGuestList?

Regards

Paul

From: Andy Marcus <andy@myguestlist.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, 20 February 2018 12:17 PM
To: Paul Rosman <paul.rosman@reservit.com.au>
Cc: Alex Ilievski <alex@myguestlist.com.au>; Yvette Manettas <Yvette@nicksgroup.com.au>; Natasha Dauner <natasha@nicksgroup.com.au>
Subject: Re: Nicks restaurants

Hey Paul,

Thanks for your email.

The API details for those three venues is the same as the others. You'll just need to push into the category with the same name as the venue.

With regards to the confirmation emails - will you be sending out the confirmation emails for those three venues only or for the whole group? We've currently disabled confirmation emails for Adrian/Angus/Stacks as these were previously handled by Dimmi. We can keep them disabled for ReservIT as well but, I need to know if we should disable the others as well?

Thanks

Andy

​

--

Andy Marcus

MyGuestlist

E | andy@myguestlist.com M | +61 417 125 725 T | +61 (03) 9999 2585 W | www.myguestlist.com

On Tue, Feb 20, 2018 at 11:58 AM, Paul Rosman <paul.rosman@reservit.com.au> wrote:

Hi Alex,

The Nicks Seafood group of restaurants have decided to revert Adria, I’m Angus and Stacks back to ReservIT from Dimmi.

For these sites we will need to export booking data and email confirmation to MGL as per existing Reservit sites. ReservIT will be managing one database for these 3 restaurants. Can MGL supply the appropriate API’s ?

Nicks will also be using ReservIT online booking system. However, the online booking system currently produces its own confirmation email. How do you want to handle the online booking as we need the customer and booking information but no confirmation email?

Regards

Paul

0432 411 844
